sentence.idiomatic: The excellent showing by the athletes in the Special Olympics demonstrated their positive, industrious spirit.
The museum will have periodical exhibitions of painting and calligraphy works. Those friends who are interested can follow them with interest.
Hurry up and show us what you bought at the Pacific Department Store yesterday.
The popular trends this season are short boots, three-quarter sleeved coats and long gloves.
Winter has arrived. The temperature is showing a lowering trend.
In the wake of China's economic development, the Chinese language has become trendier and trendier.
After learning that she was the daughter of the Chairman of the Board, his attitude towards her took a 180 degree turn.
The education model needs to change from teacher-centered to student-centered.
I don't know since when, but their relationship has changed from friends to sweethearts.
When she smiles the corners of her mouth slightly turn up, it's really charming.
The continuous increase in housing prices causes a big headache to a lot of young people that want to buy a house and get married.
Recently the price of rice, flour, vegetables and fruit have all gone up.
When my boyfriend feels like playing computer games, it's no use getting upset. I just have to play with him.
I love going out shopping with my shopping pals on the weekends. It's really so fun.
I have a few friends who love to travel on their own. If I have the chance I will go with them.
After doing a thorough comparison, I've decided to write the entrance exam for a university in Beijing.
These two guys are both pretty good. Help me figure out which one I should choose to be my boyfriend.
He analyzed the stock market every day, but in the end he still lost money.
The amount of money I spend on clothing each month is not small.
How come you take great pains to earn money each month, yet spend more than you make.
Once you're dating, your transportation, phone and meal expenditures will all go up.

Now I will present to everyone the results of the consumer behavior survey. Please look at the chart on the overhead projector. This diagram depicts the consumer behavioral trends of the city's residents for this year. Everyone will notice, there has been a gradual shift from passive to active consumption. In other words, they have a deeper understanding of the product. Look at this curved line, it shows a continuous rising trend, and the range is comparatively large. Chen Lei, are you tired?
Huh? No, I'm fine.

Focus your mind. Everyone look again at the second analysis chart. It is the specific consumer groups classification. From this pie chart we see that 30% of respondents were fond of purchasing brand name goods.
Director, is there any distinction between age, gender and profession?
Later there will be. Chen Lei, wake up! You are going to have to write a report on the chart.
I know.
Let's continue. Who can tell me what trend this bar graph is showing?
Consumer demand of durable consumer goods is rapidly rising. Combined with this preceding element, we can estimate that after a few years the rate of increase will still continue.
Uh-huh. The report needs to analyze this point in detail.
Huh? Analyze what in detail?
Chen Lei, when I'm talking, please don't talk. This is not kindergarten. I shouldn't have to teach you these kinds of things.
Director, I apologize.

Everyone, please notice the data represented by the columns and rows, it distinguishes time and consumers' durable goods expenditures, so we notice this year's expenditures are the most in almost five years, and compared with the previous year it has the largest annual growth rate ever. Whose phone is that? Chen Lei!
